Class Slime

Prop
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.Punishment
ca.sfu.cmpt276.fall2025.team14.model.Slime
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
public class Slime extends Punishment
Represents a radiation-based punishment that uses a shared static countdown timer across all radiation tiles. The countdown ticks globally, ensuring that walking across multiple radiation tiles does not reset the timer.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Slime()
    Constructs a new Slime punishment using the "prop-slime" sprite.

  • Method Summary

    Method

    Returns the punishment type associated with slime.
    void
    update()
    Slime tiles have no per-frame update behavior.
